events.message: The claimant reported a car accident that happened on the morning of May 9th involving a collision with another vehicle at a busy intersection.
The insurance claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following initial review of the provided incident details and keywords.
An agent specializing in automobile accidents was assigned to handle the claimant's file and provide assistance throughout the process.
We have acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the claimant that their case is now registered and being processed.
The claimant was asked to provide a copy of the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and their driver’s license for verification.
The claimant submitted all requested documents, including police report and images of the damaged vehicle, facilitating further evaluation.
An investigation team was assigned to review the claim details, documents, and accident circumstances to determine liability and validity.
The investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault, and the accident details were verified through cross-checking multiple sources.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and car rental reimbursement was proposed to the claimant for their review and approval.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and appreciated the prompt and professional handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance company based on all gathered evidence and claimant’s acceptance of terms.
Payment for the settlement amount was processed and deposited into the claimant's account as per the agreed terms.
Following payment issuance and claimant's confirmation, the claim file was closed formally and no further actions remain pending.
All documentation related to the auto accident claim has been archived in the system for compliance and future reference.
